text: When are you gonna start learning to play Chinese patience?
--It's not a game I can play on my own.
It's quite a good game actually.
Next time you get the cards out we'll have, we'll try it.
Either that or American gin rummy.
Well it'd be a change from cribbage wouldn't it?
Ah maybe not but it'd be a change.
--One of these afternoons when it's cold and wet  --
--we'll get the cards out and play Chinese patience.
